channel.title: Research on Yufan Zhang
channel.description: Recent content in Research on Yufan Zhang

item.title: MF-Net: A Noval Stylized Multilingual Font Generation Method
item.description: Develop a GAN-based model to achieve fast few-shot font style transfer between unseen languages

item.title: Visualizing NFT Ethics: A Case Study on CryptoPunks
item.description: Investigate CryptoPunks, the most famous collection in the NFT market, to explore and visualize its potential ethical issues.

item.title: Using AlphaFold and GNN to Predict Catalytic Efficiency
item.description: Utilize the output of AlphaFold as the enzyme feature to predict catalytic efficiency with GNN
